about_the_game:
Record in 24-bit.
Export your tracks to WAVE lossless format.

Includes*:
  • OhmBoyz Delay
  • Minimonsta Synth

* Included as native Ohm Studio plugins only. These plugins will not work in 3rd party DAW software.
detailed_description:
Record in 24-bit.
Export your tracks to WAVE lossless format.

Includes*:
  • OhmBoyz Delay
  • Minimonsta Synth

* Included as native Ohm Studio plugins only. These plugins will not work in 3rd party DAW software.
legal_notice: Copyright © 2013 Ohm Force — In order to use Ohm Studio, Users must indicate that they have read and agreed to the Terms of Use.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.5.8
  • Processor: Intel Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Original graphic card or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: CoreAudio compatible sound card

name: Ohm Studio Pro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP Service Pack 2
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or Athlon 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 9 years old graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX/MME compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or Athlon 64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 years old graphic card or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible sound card

reviews:
“Ohm Studio now frees us from the previous limitations that we may not have even been aware of. The future is here.”
9/10 – MusicTech

“[Ohm Boyz] One of the most flexible and interesting delays available. An inspiration.”
10/10 – Future Music

“[Minimonsta] This instrument represents a quantum improvement over the original and leaves all competing Moog emulators smoldering in the dust. A perfect recreation with amazing new features.”
5/5 – Mac Directory Magazine
